attributes.action: Create tougher laws on animal abusers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
-Introduce fines of up to £5000 for anyone caught starting,participating or watching dogfighting regardless of age.

-Introduce an automatic Lifetime ban for anyone charged with animal cruelty offences and include the fine of up to £5000 and depending on the case prison sentences.

-Animal abusers should have their whole family receiving a lifetime ban on owning any animal.

-Animal abusers who refuse to pay the fine or illegaly have a family member own an animal after the ban receive a 6month prison sentence

-Inforce the laws by making it a policy for the RSPCA to check up on animal abusers every 6months.

many thanks, from the public of the United Kingdom
